result.eng: He was waiting at the house door.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.orig: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.html: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag fanaċt ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.

result.eng: I am still waiting for the letter.
result.ga: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.orig: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.html: Tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé fós ag fanaċt leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.

result.ga: Tá na páistí ag fanacht amuigh
result.orig: Tá na páistí ag fanacht amuigh
result.html: Tá na páistí ag fanacht amuighThe children are waiting outside.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí ag fanaċt amuiġThe children are waiting outside.

result.ga: Tá na páistí ag fanacht taobh amuigh

result.eng: Would you mind waiting a minute?
result.html: Ar mhiste leat fanacht nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat fanaċt nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?

result.eng: I was waiting for an hour for a taxi.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaí
result.orig: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaí
result.html: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaíI was waiting for an hour for a taxi.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag fanaċt uair an ċloig ar ṫacsaíI was waiting for an hour for a taxi.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.

result.eng: We've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ga: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
